name: ARENA 3099
description:
On Earth 3099, cyborg fighting arenas are all the rage. Fight in the Chimera Colosseum, where you can battle products of researchers and scientists who had gone beyond their original capabilities, killed by their own creations.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Dash - Space

Shoot - Left Mouse Click

Credits

Tableu - Programming

Am000zing - Art, Animation

Violetgallus - Illustration

Maddok7 - Music

Fokai - SFX
